page.title: 14COUNTRY LIFE-DAVID AGED 12.
page.content: { I like}living in the country because I have so much space to race around on my{BMX bike.}I am able to make my own course with Whoops and Berms. I get lots of fun and practice for racing. I also like{fishing}and have lots of smashing places nearby where fishing is allowed. I also like to take my{dog}for a walk, and near me there is a very large wood which the dog likes to run in. I do not like walking along the{Fosse Way.}It is a very busy road with cars going so fast that my dog cringes when they go past. The car drivers do not seem to care about me when they rush past. { Where I live is one of the only {places in England where 2 ancient {roads cross. The Welsh Rd}is also a busy road. I feel sorry for all the birds, hedgehogs and rabbits who get killed on the road.
